entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
